description.zh-cn: 指中国工农红军成军初期，朱德和毛泽东对红四军领导权的一次争夺，以罗福嶂会议为导火索，以古田会议为结束。
description.en: Refers to a leadership struggle between Zhu De and Mao Zedong over the command of the Red Fourth Army during the early period of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army. It was triggered by the Luofuzhang Conference and concluded with the Gutian Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中华人民共和国和中国人民解放军的主要缔造者和领导人之一，中华人民共和国元帅。
description.en: One of the main founders and leaders of the Communist Party of China, the People's Republic of China, and the People's Liberation Army; a Marshal of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中华人民共和国和中国人民解放军的主要缔造者和领导人之一。
description.en: One of the main founders and leaders of the Communist Party of China, the People's Republic of China, and the People's Liberation Army.

en: Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在第二次国内革命战争时期领导的军队。
description.en: The army led by the Communist Party of China during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军主力部队之一，朱毛之争的核心单位。
description.en: One of the main forces of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army and the central unit in the Zhu-Mao controversy.

description.zh-cn: 1929年2月3日红四军召开的会议，在会上毛泽东取消了红四军军委，成为朱毛之争的导火索。
description.en: A meeting held by the Red Fourth Army on February 3, 1929, where Mao Zedong abolished its military commission, triggering the Zhu-Mao controversy.

description.zh-cn: 红四军第九次党代表会议，会议确立了毛泽东的建军思想和对军队的领导地位，结束了朱毛之争。
description.en: The 9th Party Congress of the Red Fourth Army, which established Mao Zedong's principles of army building and his leadership over the army, ending the Zhu-Mao controversy.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军主力之一，朱毛之争后由毛泽东确立了领导地位。
description.en: One of the main forces of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, over which Mao Zedong established leadership after the Zhu-Mao controversy.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党军事家、外交家、诗人，中华人民共和国元帅。
description.en: A Chinese Communist military commander, diplomat, and poet; a Marshal of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要领导人之一，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: One of the main leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, served as the first Premier of the People's Republic of China.

en: Central Military Commission of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党最高军事领导机构。
description.en: The highest military leadership body of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 1929年2月7日，中共中央发给红四军的指示信，要求朱德和毛泽东离开部队前往中央。该指示后被毛泽东拒绝，并被九月来信撤销。
description.en: An instruction letter sent by the CCP Central Committee to the Red Fourth Army on February 7, 1929, demanding that Zhu De and Mao Zedong leave the troops for the central headquarters. The instruction was later rejected by Mao and rescinded by the 'September Letter'.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央特派员，曾来到红四军，免去毛泽东的政治部主任职务。
description.en: A special commissioner from the CCP Central Committee who came to the Red Fourth Army and removed Mao Zedong from the post of Director of the Political Department.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，曾在朱毛之争中坚决支持毛泽东。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China who firmly supported Mao Zedong during the Zhu-Mao controversy.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党高级将领和政治家，曾在朱毛之争中支持毛泽东。
description.en: A senior general and politician of the Communist Party of China who supported Mao Zedong during the Zhu-Mao controversy.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军高级将领，曾在朱毛之争中支持毛泽东。
description.en: A senior commander of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army who supported Mao Zedong during the Zhu-Mao controversy.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前领导人，曾在朱毛之争中支持毛泽东。
description.en: A former leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China who supported Mao Zedong during the Zhu-Mao controversy.

description.zh-cn: 1929年6月22日红四军在龙岩召开的党代表会议，会上免去了毛泽东的前委书记职务，改由陈毅担任。
description.en: A party congress held by the Red Fourth Army in Longyan on June 22, 1929, where Mao Zedong was removed from his position as Secretary of the Front Committee, and Chen Yi was appointed to replace him.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期主要领导人之一，与周恩来共同起草了支持毛泽东的九月来信。
description.en: An early key leader of the Communist Party of China who, along with Zhou Enlai, drafted the 'September Letter' in support of Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 1929年9月中共中央发出的指示信，明确要求重新选举毛泽东为前委书记，是毛泽东在朱毛之争中获胜的关键。
description.en: An instruction letter from the CCP Central Committee in September 1929 that explicitly called for the re-election of Mao Zedong as Secretary of the Front Committee, which was key to Mao's victory in the Zhu-Mao controversy.

description.zh-cn: 朱毛之争后，毛泽东为整肃反对者而发起的反AB团运动所导致的事件。
description.en: An incident resulting from the anti-AB-Tuan campaign launched by Mao Zedong to purge opponents after the Zhu-Mao controversy.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人，曾在富田事变后轻易夺取了毛泽东的军权。
description.en: An early leader of the Communist Party of China who easily seized military power from Mao Zedong after the Futian Incident.

description.zh-cn: 红四军的最高领导机构，其书记职位是朱毛之争的焦点。
description.en: The highest leading body of the Red Fourth Army, whose secretarial position was the focus of the Zhu-Mao controversy.

description.zh-cn: 曾是红四军的领导机构之一，先后由陈毅、朱德任书记，后在罗福嶂会议上被毛泽东取消。
description.en: Formerly one of the leading bodies of the Red Fourth Army, with Chen Yi and Zhu De serving as secretaries successively. It was abolished by Mao Zedong at the Luofuzhang Conference.

description.zh-cn: 在朱毛之争中，毛泽东与朱德就红四军的领导权和建军原则产生严重分歧和矛盾，相互指责，最终以毛泽东胜利和双方和解告终。
description.en: During the Zhu-Mao controversy, Mao Zedong and Zhu De had serious disagreements and conflicts over the leadership of the Red Fourth Army and its building principles, accusing each other. The dispute ended with Mao's victory and a reconciliation between the two.

description.zh-cn: 该会议是朱毛之争的导火索。
description.en: This conference was the trigger for the Zhu-Mao controversy.

description.zh-cn: 该会议的召开标志着朱毛之争的结束。
description.en: The convening of this conference marked the end of the Zhu-Mao controversy.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东在此次斗争中取胜后，确立了对中央红军的领导地位，为其成为中共领袖铺平了道路。
description.en: After winning this struggle, Mao Zedong established his leadership over the Central Red Army, paving the way for him to become the leader of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 在罗福嶂会议上，毛泽东成功地取消了由朱德领导的红四军军委，独揽了红四军的党政军领导权。
description.en: At the Luofuzhang Conference, Mao Zedong successfully abolished the Military Commission of the Red Fourth Army, which was led by Zhu De, and took sole control of the party, government, and military leadership of the army.

description.zh-cn: 代表中共中央军委发出二月来信，要求毛泽东脱离部队前往中央，试图以此调解争端。
description.en: On behalf of the CCP Central Military Commission, sent the 'February Letter' requesting Mao Zedong to leave the army for the central headquarters, in an attempt to mediate the dispute.

description.zh-cn: 代表中共中央军委发出二月来信，要求朱德脱离部队前往中央，试图以此调解争端。
description.en: On behalf of the CCP Central Military Commission, sent the 'February Letter' requesting Zhu De to leave the army for the central headquarters, in an attempt to mediate the dispute.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东以红四军前敌委员会的名义回信中央，拒绝了二月来信中要求其交出指挥权的指示，称其为“不切实际的想法”。
description.en: Mao Zedong, in the name of the Front Committee of the Red Fourth Army, replied to the Central Committee, rejecting the directive in the 'February Letter' to hand over command, calling it an 'impractical idea'.

description.zh-cn: 免去了毛泽东的红四军政治部主任一职并自任之。
description.en: Removed Mao Zedong from the position of Director of the Political Department of the Red Fourth Army and took the post himself.

description.zh-cn: 会议上支持朱德的一派占据上风，免去了毛泽东的前委书记职务，并给予其严重警告。
description.en: At the conference, the faction supporting Zhu De gained the upper hand, removing Mao Zedong from his post as Secretary of the Front Committee and giving him a serious warning.

description.zh-cn: 在红四军第七次党代会上接替毛泽东担任前委书记，以调和朱毛矛盾。
description.en: Succeeded Mao Zedong as the Secretary of the Front Committee at the Seventh Party Congress of the Red Fourth Army to mediate the Zhu-Mao conflict.

description.zh-cn: 该信由中共中央发出，明确要求重新选举毛泽东为前委书记，成为毛泽东在朱毛之争中获得全面胜利的关键。
description.en: This letter from the CCP Central Committee explicitly demanded the re-election of Mao Zedong as Secretary of the Front Committee, becoming the key to Mao's complete victory in the Zhu-Mao controversy.

description.zh-cn: 与周恩来一同起草了九月来信，支持毛泽东重掌红四军领导权。
description.en: Co-drafted the 'September Letter' with Zhou Enlai, supporting Mao Zedong's return to the leadership of the Red Fourth Army.

description.zh-cn: 与李立三一同起草了九月来信，支持毛泽东重掌红四军领导权。
description.en: Co-drafted the 'September Letter' with Li Lisan, supporting Mao Zedong's return to the leadership of the Red Fourth Army.

description.zh-cn: 会议全盘接受了毛泽东的建军主张，并选举其为前委书记，巩固了其领导地位。
description.en: The conference fully adopted Mao Zedong's principles on army building and elected him as Secretary of the Front Committee, consolidating his leadership position.

description.zh-cn: 在朱毛之争中，尤其是在白沙会议上，林彪毅然站到毛泽东一边，坚决支持毛，赢得了毛泽东数十年的绝对信任。
description.en: During the Zhu-Mao controversy, especially at the Baisha Conference, Lin Biao resolutely sided with and supported Mao Zedong, earning Mao's absolute trust for decades.

description.zh-cn: 在朱毛之争中，向其老上级朱德、陈毅反戈一击，转而支持毛泽东。
description.en: During the Zhu-Mao controversy, he turned against his old superiors Zhu De and Chen Yi to support Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 在朱毛之争中，向其老上级朱德、陈毅反戈一击，转而支持毛泽东。
description.en: During the Zhu-Mao controversy, he turned against his old superiors Zhu De and Chen Yi to support Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 在白沙会议上坚决支持毛泽东。
description.en: Resolutely supported Mao Zedong at the Baisha Conference.

description.zh-cn: 在白沙会议上坚决支持毛泽东。
description.en: Resolutely supported Mao Zedong at the Baisha Conference.

description.zh-cn: 在白沙会议上坚决支持毛泽东。
description.en: Resolutely supported Mao Zedong at the Baisha Conference.

description.zh-cn: 文中暗示，毛泽东在朱毛之争中显露的控制欲，导致其后借反AB团之名进行整肃，最终引发富田事变。
description.en: The text implies that the desire for control shown by Mao Zedong during the Zhu-Mao controversy led him to later conduct purges in the name of combating the AB-Tuan, which ultimately triggered the Futian Incident.

description.zh-cn: 其处理富田事变的残酷手段开罪了江西许多中共基层干部，间接导致博古此后轻易夺取其军权。
description.en: His brutal handling of the Futian Incident offended many local CCP cadres in Jiangxi, indirectly allowing Bo Gu to easily seize his military power later.

description.zh-cn: 在富田事变后，利用其造成的不利影响轻易夺取了毛泽东的军权。
description.en: After the Futian Incident, he took advantage of its negative impact to easily seize military power from Mao Zedong.
